author: liverpool.news@trinitymirror.com (Charlotte Hadfield)
title: Torrential rain to hit Liverpool in weekend washout ahead of New Year
text: Liverpool will be battered by torrential rain this weekend ahead of New Year's Eve. The Met Office issued a yellow [weather](https://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/all-about/weather) warning for Merseyside earlier this week as [Storm Gerrit](https://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/news/what-supercell-thunderstorm-localised-tornado-28356546) swept across the country. While the "challenging conditions" brought by the storm have now eased, the region can still expect to see wet and windy weather in the coming days, according to the Met Office. The weather agency said: "The last few days of 2023 are forecast to be unsettled, with strong winds, rain and even snow featuring in parts of the UK. An area of low pressure which pushes in from the west on Saturday will be the most dominant feature in the forecast leading up to the new year." READ MORE: [Man went 'out of his mind' after devastating phone call from his brother](https://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/news/liverpool-news/man-went-out-mind-after-28357314) READ MORE: [Boxer 'wins most important fight' after being stabbed in chest](https://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/news/liverpool-news/boxer-wins-most-important-fight-28361081) The latest forecast for Liverpool shows heavy rain to start the day on Saturday, before this changes to overcast by late morning. Winds of up to 35mph are forecast by lunchtime, with the rain returning into the afternoon on Saturday. However, temperatures are expected to remain mild for this time of year, averaging at around 10 degrees. The Met Office said a "deep area of low pressure" will move across the country on Saturday. The boundary between the area of low pressure and the relatively colder conditions further north and east could lead to snow across higher ground in the north of England and Scotland. Met Office chief forecaster, Steven Ramsdale, said: ‚ÄúThis system is likely to bring a range of weather including hill snow. Heavy rain will spread across all but the far north on Saturday affecting similar areas previously affected by Storm Gerrit. However, this rainfall will be a step down from that seen during Storm Gerrit.‚Äù Looking further ahead into 2024, there is low forecast confidence. Nick Silkstone is a Met Office Deputy Chief Forecaster. He said: ‚ÄúThrough to mid-January, there is a signal for a shift in the pattern compared to the winter so far, with more settled and colder-than-average conditions becoming increasingly likely.‚Äù [Don't miss the biggest and breaking stories by signing up to the Echo Daily newsletter here](https://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/newsletter-preference-centre/?view=Solus&mailingListId=5ec7f1cc-052c-409a-a8f2-739597fa11c9&utm_source=solusarticle)

author: world today us
title: Garry‚Äôs Mod Removes Nintendo Content Due to Copyright Requests: Developers Respond
text:
The Copyright Battle ‚Äì Garry‚Äôs Mod Removes Nintendo Add-Ons The popular physics sandbox game Garry‚Äôs Mod faced copyright takedown requests from Nintendo The popular physics sandbox game Garry‚Äôs Mod recently made headlines as it removed all Nintendo-related add-ons from its platform. This action comes as a response to copyright takedown requests from the gaming giant. Garry‚Äôs Mod‚Äôs developers addressed the situation in a recent announcement on Steam:
‚ÄúMay have noticed that certain Nintendo-related workshop items have recently been taken down ‚Äì this is not a mistake.‚Äù
The developers acknowledged Nintendo‚Äôs rights over its content, stating, ‚ÄúWhat they allow and don‚Äôt allow is up to them. They don‚Äôt want you playing with that stuff in Garry‚Äôs Mod ‚Äì that‚Äôs their decision, and we have to respect that and take down as much as we can. This is an ongoing process, as we have 20 years of uploads to go through.‚Äù
Garry‚Äôs Mod faced skepticism and later confirmed the validity of the takedown requests Some Garry‚Äôs Mod users initially believed that the copyright takedown requests were not truly from Nintendo but rather from a copyright troll. In response to these doubts, Garry‚Äôs Mod creator Garry Newman took the time to investigate further.
Garry Newman, on his official Twitter account, confirmed the authenticity of the takedown requests and stated, ‚ÄúI have been assured that these takedown requests are legitimate.‚Äù
The confirmation from the game‚Äôs creator seemingly puts the skepticism to rest, affirming that the requests did indeed come from Nintendo.
The significant impact on Garry‚Äôs Mod and Nintendo-related content The takedown requests necessitate the removal of a vast array of Nintendo-related maps and other items from Garry‚Äôs Mod. Throughout the years, players have been able to create content within Garry‚Äôs Mod that includes turning games like Super Mario 64 into first-person shooter experiences or exploring Hyrule as Link.
As the amount of Nintendo-related content is substantial, Garry‚Äôs Mod developers are requesting assistance from the community to proactively remove any user-created content that potentially infringes on Nintendo‚Äôs rights.
The Verge reached out to Nintendo for comment on this matter, but has yet to receive a response.

author: Michael Gwilliam
title: PETA demands MrBeast 'leave animals alone' as YouTuber 100 men vs Gorilla video - Dexerto
text:
PETA demands MrBeast ‚Äòleave animals alone‚Äô as YouTuber plots 100 men vs Gorilla video by Michael Gwilliam Published: Apr 30, 2025, 21:55
Save for later
Save for later Dexerto/MrBeast PETA is calling out MrBeast after the YouTuber humorously requested volunteers for a video to solve the viral 100 men vs a Gorilla question.
In late April, the internet became infatuated with a simple, yet humorous viral hypothetical: could 100 men work together to defeat a single Gorilla?
This question resulted in widespread discussion, simulations, experts weighing in and content creators drafting their ‚Äúdream teams‚Äù in a battle against a gorilla.
Amid the height of the question, Jimmy ‚Äò MrBeast ‚Äô Donaldson revealed he needed 100 men to volunteer to make the battle a reality ‚Äì something that got the attention of Elon Musk and IShowSpeed .
Article continues after ad The video also caught the eye of activist group PETA, who called out the world‚Äôs most-subscribed YouTuber in a series of posts.
PETA urges MrBeast not to ‚Äúexploit‚Äù animals for 100 men vs Gorilla video PETA responded to MrBeast‚Äôs tweet about the viral debate, furious at his joke about making a potential video to test out the situation in real life.
Article continues after ad ‚Äú100 men vs. a gorilla? Maybe try 100 reasons to leave animals out of your content instead,‚Äù they blasted. ‚ÄúWe love to have fun ‚Äî just leave animals out of it.‚Äù
Article continues after ad
100 men vs. a gorilla? Maybe try 100 reasons to leave animals out of your content instead‚Ä¶
‚Äî PETA (@peta) April 28, 2025 When another user responded by saying the video would be fun for the animals, the group fired back: ‚ÄúExploiting animals isn‚Äôt fun for them. Let‚Äôs give them the freedom to enjoy real fun: in their natural habitats, where they belong.‚Äù
Exploiting animals isn't fun for them üëé Let's give them the freedom to enjoy real fun: in their natural habitats, where they belong üíØ
‚Äî PETA (@peta) April 29, 2025 PETA further encouraged MrBeast to move away from the gorilla video in favor of helping bulls in India, instead.
‚ÄúWant to prove real strength, MrBeast?‚Äù they asked. ‚ÄúDitch the gorilla fight and help retire bulls forced to haul tons of sugarcane in scorching heat by replacing them with tractors.‚Äù
Article continues after ad
Want to prove real strength, @MrBeast ?
Ditch the gorilla fight and help retire bulls forced to haul tons of sugarcane in scorching heat by replacing them with tractors üêÇüöú pic.twitter.com/sMHsHNKydw
‚Äî PETA (@peta) April 29, 2025 Funnily enough, MrBeast isn‚Äôt one to shy away from philanthropic work, and has done quite a lot for charity like planting 20M trees , curing 1,000 people‚Äôs blindness and removing millions of pounds of trash from the ocean.
Article continues after ad Thus far, Donaldson hasn‚Äôt responded to PETA ‚Äì but it‚Äôs also not like he was actually planning on having 100 people fight a real gorilla, given the legal and moral issues with such a concept.
It‚Äôs not clear exactly what MrBeast has in store for this gorilla content, or if PETA will continue to call him out, regardless of what video he ends up making.
Article continues after ad PETA, meanwhile, has a history of calling out hot topics to promote its own agenda.
During the height of Palworld‚Äôs popularity, the organization accused the game of promoting animal cruelty and suggested a vegan guide for the game.
keep reading Related Topics Mrbeast

author: Il Resto del Carlino
title: Vacanza da incubo alle Cinque Terre, lo sfogo dei turisti: "Oltre 200 euro di biglietti per stare nelle stazioni"
text:
Turisti all‚Äôassalto delle 5 Terre
Cinque Terre, 1 maggio 2025 ‚Äì Una spesa di oltre 200 euro in biglietti del treno per passare buona parte del soggiorno sulle banchine ferroviarie anzich√© a gustare i fantastici paesaggi delle Cinque Terre . √à la complicata giornata da turisti vissuta lo scorso 26 aprile da una comitiva di otto persone originarie delle Marche , che ha deciso di scrivere a La Nazione non solo per raccontare la propria esperienza ma anche per auspicare l‚Äôintervento delle istituzioni al fine di un miglioramento della situazione. ‚ÄúAll‚Äôufficio informazioni di Trenitalia ‚Äì spiega Osvaldo Regno ‚Äì ci hanno spiegato a grandi linee le condizioni di utilizzo del trenino e il relativo costo che, nel nostro caso √® stato di 214 euro (sei adulti, un bambino di cinque anni e uno di due; ndr). Siamo partiti dalla Spezia con destinazione Monterosso : questa prima tappa tutto normale‚Äù. A Vernazza per√≤ arrivano i primi problemi. ‚ÄúArrivati in stazione gi√† si intravedevano difficolt√† nel deflusso dei viaggiatori in arrivo e in partenza; in questa stazione il treno ferma in galleria e li si scende arrivando sul marciapiede ridotto con rischio di cadute sui binari ‚Äì dice Regno ‚Äì. La localit√† era strapiena di turisti e la via principale era bloccata dal flusso umano comportando problemi negli spostamenti e anche rischi di sicurezza per tutti e in particolare per i bambini‚Äù. La comitiva riparte, ‚Äúnon senza difficolt√† per salire vista le tante persone che sostavano sul marciapiede‚Äù dalla stazione di Vernazza a quella di Corniglia, dove avrebbe avuto ‚Äúseri problemi per poter scendere dal treno a causa delle tantissime persone; siamo rimasti tutti bloccati sul marciapiede perch√© il deflusso tra chi arrivava e chi tornava aveva creato un blocco totale. Dopo venti minuti siamo riusciti a salire in strada, ma purtroppo anche qui la situazione era identica alla precedente e proibitiva. Troppa gente, pertanto abbiamo deciso di rinunciare a questa tappa e riprendere il treno‚Äù.
Ritornati sulla banchina, con i turisti ‚Äúammassati in modo indecente in un limitato spazio fisico, costretti a dover sostare anche oltre la riga gialla‚Äù, l‚Äôattesa per la comitiva √® durata per circa trenta minuti , ‚Äúdovuti anche al solito ritardo del treno. La sicurezza in questa situazione era totalmente preclusa per tutti, e avendo due piccoli da tutelare si pu√≤ immaginare la tensione e la paura per quella situazione‚Äù dice Regno, che assieme agli altri ha poi raggiunto Manarola attraverso un ‚Äútreno gi√† super affollato ogni oltre limite. Speravamo in una situazione migliore invece, anche qui, blocco totale nel prendere il sottopassaggio per uscire dalla stazione, tutti fermi per altri 20 minuti‚Äù. Risultato: la comitiva √® ritornata subito alla Spezia senza aver visitato praticamente nulla. ‚ÄúUn‚Äôesperienza decisamente negativa‚Äù dice Regno, che propone di ‚Äúcontingentare l‚Äôaffluenza come previsto per le manifestazioni aperte al pubblico per garantirne la sicurezza. Trenitalia e tutti gli enti interessati dovrebbero valutare la necessit√† di adottare criteri e interventi volti a limitare i disagi ma ancor di pi√π a garantire la sicurezza delle persone. Siamo dispiaciuti, rammaricati e anche molto arrabbiati perch√® ci siamo sentiti ‚Äôfregati‚Äô sia riguardo la mancata informazione su eventuali rischi di affollamento e per aver speso 214 euro per passare la maggior parte del tempo sui marciapiedi delle stazioni senza poter di fatto visitare i luoghi‚Äù.
¬© Riproduzione riservata

title: Bonos de Mujeres con Bienestar son falsos: no caigas en el fraude
text:
El bono econ√≥mico de Mujeres con Bienestar es falso . La Secretar√≠a de Bienestar niega que ofrezca alg√∫n tipo de pr√©stamos o cr√©ditos a trav√©s de llamadas telef√≥nicas, mensajes de texto, ni WhatsApp y afirm√≥ que en caso de recibirlo, se trata de un fraude , por lo que recomienda a los ciudadanos a mantenerse alerta y no contestar ni dar datos a trav√©s de estas aplicaciones.
Publicidad La titular de la dependencia federal, Ariadna Montiel Reyes , aclar√≥ que tampoco se ofrecen tarjetas, ni programas a trav√©s de llamadas telef√≥nicas ni mensajes de texto.
‚ÄúConvoc√≥ a la poblaci√≥n a no dejarse sorprender por este tipo de enga√±os, no contestar los mensajes donde se les ofrecen pr√©stamos, ni proporcionar datos personales, n√∫mero o NIP de la tarjeta del Banco del Bienestar‚Äù, detall√≥ la Secretar√≠a del Bienestar en un comunicado.
#Comunicado üì∞ | #Bienestar no entrega pr√©stamos ni cr√©ditos a cuenta de los Programas del Bienestar

Canales oficiales de la Secretar√≠a del Bienestar
La secretaria llam√≥ a derechohabientes y beneficiarios a mantenerse informados s√≥lo a trav√©s de la p√°gina oficial de la Secretar√≠a de Bienestar gob.mx/bienestar , y redes institucionales:
Facebook: bienestar.mx ; X antes Twitter: @bienestarmx ; Youtube: Secretar√≠a de Bienestar ; Instagram: bienestarmx , as√≠ como a trav√©s de la L√≠nea de Bienestar: 800 639 42 64.
Por √∫ltimo, record√≥ que todos los tr√°mites y servicios que ofrece la Secretar√≠a de Bienestar son totalmente gratuitos, y se realizan de manera personal y sin intermediarios.
Tr√°mites ante la Secretar√≠a del Bienestar

Publicidad Lo √∫ltimo ‚ÄúVoy a pacificar Chiapas‚Äù, ofrece Eduardo Ram√≠rez, gobernador electo de Chiapas Civiles armados marchan en municipios de Chiapas; combatir√°n a c√°rteles, dicen Edomex: Recolectores de basura denuncian extorsi√≥n de hasta 50 mil semanales Publicidad Tags Secretar√≠a de Bienestar Banco del Bienestar Recomendaciones Econom√≠a Se agot√≥ el presupuesto 2024 y NO habr√° m√°s registros a Mujeres con Bienestar 1 Min Read Econom√≠a ¬øA qu√© programas del Bienestar puedes acceder, seg√∫n tu situaci√≥n? 19 Min Read M√°s acerca del autor: Expansi√≥n Digital @ExpansionMx Newsletter function GetReferrerDomainX() { var preUrl = document.referrer; //console.log("GetReferrerDomainX
